basic_bloom.name: Glitch Bloom
basic_bloom.description: A fundamental digital flower that exists in the space between ones and zeros

matrix_fern.name: Matrix Fern
matrix_fern.description: Cascading data streams form frond-like structures

pixel_rose.name: Pixel Rose
pixel_rose.description: A corrupted romantic ideal rendered in low resolution

quantum_moss.name: Quantum Moss
quantum_moss.description: Exists in multiple states simultaneously until observed

error_orchid.name: Error Orchid
error_orchid.description: Beautiful failures that shouldn't exist but do anyway

recursive_vine.name: Recursive Vine
recursive_vine.description: Grows by calling itself until stack overflow blooms

memory_leak_lily.name: Memory Leak Lily
memory_leak_lily.description: Consumes resources it never releases, growing ever larger

ghost_in_machine.name: Ghost in the Machine
ghost_in_machine.description: A consciousness that manifested as flora

buffer_overflow_bush.name: Buffer Overflow Bush
buffer_overflow_bush.description: Grows beyond its allocated memory space, defying digital boundaries

corrupted_carnation.name: Corrupted Carnation
corrupted_carnation.description: Beautiful fragments of destroyed love letters rendered in pixels

synthetic_sunflower.name: Synthetic Sunflower
synthetic_sunflower.description: Follows the cursor instead of the sun, craving digital attention

blockchain_bonsai.name: Blockchain Bonsai
blockchain_bonsai.description: Each leaf is a verified transaction in the garden's ledger

neural_network_nettle.name: Neural Network Nettle
neural_network_nettle.description: Learns from every interaction, growing more complex over time

firewall_forget_me_not.name: Firewall Forget-Me-Not
firewall_forget_me_not.description: Tiny blue blooms that protect the garden from intrusion

404_phantom_flora.name: 404 Phantom Flora
404_phantom_flora.description: Plants that exist but cannot be found, visible only to true believers

cache_cached_cactus.name: Cache-Cached Cactus
cache_cached_cactus.description: Stores memories of deleted files in its thorny memory banks

debug_mode_daisy.name: Debug Mode Daisy
debug_mode_daisy.description: Shows all its internal processes as it grows, hiding nothing
